snippet: Rossini’s rarely produced “Ciro in Babilonia” received an ambitious new staging in the Bel Canto at Caramoor series, with Ewa Podles in the title role.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Rossini opera Ciro in Babilonia, part of the Bel Canto series at the Caramoor International Music Festival in Katonah, NY; Davide Livermore directs and Ewa Podles stars.
lead_paragraph: Rossini’s rarely produced “Ciro in Babilonia” received an ambitious new staging in the Bel Canto at Caramoor series, with Ewa Podles in the title role.

headline.seo: ‘Ciro in Babilonia’ by Rossini, in Bel Canto at Caramoor
headline.main: An Ancient War Gets the Silent-Film Treatment via Opera
headline.print_headline: An Ancient War Gets the Silent-Film Treatment via Opera
